title: Remove aura.process command - consolidate into aura.act
description: Delete .claude/commands/aura.process.md. The process command is redundant - it just acts on entire queue. aura.act should handle both single files and queue processing.

close_reason: Deleted aura.process.md. Consolidated queue processing into aura.act - now handles single file or entire queue (no args).
